record.field: Services provided to customers who have purchased products.
Hello Admin, I know you wanted my help to fit the carpet, but I unfortunately won't be available. Sorry for the short notice.
Demo, I did not expect you to pull the rug out from under me like that!
Demo, I'm shocked to see this negative review, what happened with the cables?
Hello Admin, I'm currently investigating the problem with the client.
Hopefully, this will help throw some light over this situation. Please do not charge the customer any extra time spent on this.

function.name: rating_apply
function.eval: ([ref('project_agr_task_1')], 5, 'TS_0', None, 'This is already looking very promising, thanks for the good work!')
